AltName.entry: KICKSTART DRUG REHABILITATION DAY CENTRE (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A registered charity that runs a drug rehabilitation day centre which works in partnership with clients (aged 18 years and over), empowering them to take control of their own life. A voluntary organisation which offers a 12 week minimum programme structured to individual needs of recovery, which involves pre-programme support, structured one-to-one support sessions, training and education through to post-programme support. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office hours); Mon & Wed 4-7.30pm (session times for clients on programme)
